about_the_game:
The Seven Realms - Realm 2: Official Walkthrough will help you get the most out of your playthrough.

Just like with the Realm 1 Walkthrough, we have kept it concise and detailed. The impacts of every single choice in Realm 2 are covered.

Using this walkthrough will assist you with the following:

  • To understand the direct impact of every choice you make in the game.

  • To see how your choices impact relationships with each character.

  • To see which choices may close off branching paths or open new ones.

  • Understand other background stats that will have impacts during Realm 1 and in later Realms.

  • Show you how to unlock every lewd scene.

  • Show you how to unlock every achievement/trophy.

  • Offer some insight into the character creations of various characters.

The walkthrough will be available in a PDF format that you can use alongside the game while playing. To open the document, click the button showing "WT2" in the bottom left corner of the title screen.

content_descriptors.notes:
This walkthrough is for The Seven Realms - Realm 2.

The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

Just like with the Realm 1 Walkthrough, we have kept it concise and detailed. The impacts of every single choice in Realm 2 are covered.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: An in-depth walkthrough for Realm 2 of The Seven Realms.This concise and detailed guide will provide you with the impacts of every single choice in Realm 2.It also offers behind-the-scenes content regarding the creation of some of the characters.
